Events.year: 1860 – The first successful United States Pony Express run from St. Joseph, Missouri, to Sacramento, California, begins.

Events.html: 1885 – Gottlieb Daimler is granted a German patent for his engine design.

Events.year: 1895 – The trial in the libel case brought by Oscar Wilde begins, eventually resulting in his imprisonment on charges of homosexuality.
Events.html: 1895 – The trial in the libel case brought by Oscar Wilde begins, eventually resulting in his imprisonment on charges of homosexuality.
